attributes.description:
The Ciaz provides unparalleled space and comfort, with a roomy cabin and plenty of luggage storage. This sleek and stylish family car exudes elegance both inside and out. 

This vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 3 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This fuel efficient vehicle comes equipped with multi-function steering wheel, LED fog lights, Touchscreen audio system, Leather seats and many more.

Book your test drive today!

attributes.description:
5 year 150000 km warranty
5 year 60000 km service plan
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why AGG Westrand offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through AGG Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today
